goal: Deepen component encapsulation, eliminate prop drilling, and extract duplicated logic in src/renderer.

tasks.title: Extract Workspace DnD Handlers
tasks.description: Move the massive `handleDropToCenter` and `handleDropToSplit` functions out of EditorRoot.tsx into a dedicated `useWorkspaceDropHandlers.ts` hook.

tasks.title: Unify ChapterList UI Component
tasks.description: Extract the duplicated Chapter list rendering, drag-item wrappers, and rename/duplicate/delete floating menu logic from DocsSidebar, ScrivenerSidebar, and Sidebar into a single shared `<ChapterList />` component.

tasks.title: Eliminate Chapter Prop Drilling
tasks.description: Remove `chapters`, `activeChapterId`, `onSelectChapter`, `onRenameChapter`, etc. from the prop signatures of Layouts and Sidebars. Have the new `<ChapterList />` and `<Editor />` fetch these directly via `useChapterManagement()`.
